last_episode_to_air.name: Time of My Life
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jonathan is just weeks away from opening day and races to be ready for campers by the deadline; also, Jon and his husband reno a 1930s house they'll stay in themselves, looking to keep the vintage charm and create a space for the whole family.

name: Farmhouse Fixer: Camp Revamp
overview: New Kids on the Block star and HGTV host Jonathan Knight faces his riskiest renovation yet in Farmhouse Fixer: Camp Revamp.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Jonathan Knight takes on the biggest risk of his life as he has mere months to transform an abandoned campground into a destination oasis.

episodes.name: Take It to the Limit
episodes.overview: The offer was accepted, and now the clock is ticking as the problems pile up. Jonathan Knight is revamping an abandoned campground into a vacation destination, and the first project is to turn a rundown cabin into the perfect spot for a glamping getaway.

episodes.name: 99 Problems
episodes.overview: Catastrophe hits when a cabin is crushed by a tree, and it leads to pricey new problems. Also, Jon's siblings help renovate a cabin for families, but each Knight has their own opinion on creating the perfect spot for a family vacation.

episodes.name: Killing Me Softly
episodes.overview: Jon is hit with a gut-wrenching decision to either repair or tear down a demolished cabin; Jon's mom and sister help transform a mouse infested nightmare into a romantic couple's cabin, and the ultimate glam up includes a shower built for two.

episodes.name: Time of My Life
episodes.overview: Jonathan is just weeks away from opening day and races to be ready for campers by the deadline; also, Jon and his husband reno a 1930s house they'll stay in themselves, looking to keep the vintage charm and create a space for the whole family.
